# This file is autogenerated by always_run.py
# Do not edit this file directly

ciso_ms_soup_kitchen_conditions_effect = {
	scope = state
	is_shown = {
		NOT = {
			is_target_in_variable_list = {
				name = ciso_society_measures
				target = flag:ciso_ms_soup_kitchen
			}
		}
		always = yes
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_variable = ciso_ms_soup_kitchen_investment_var
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = ciso_ms_soup_kitchen_investment_var
				value = 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = ciso_ms_soup_kitchen_investment_var
			add = 50
		}
		add_to_variable_list = {
			name = ciso_society_measures
			target = flag:ciso_ms_soup_kitchen
		}
	}
}
ciso_ms_soup_kitchen_increment_effect = {
	scope = state
	effect = {
		change_variable = {
			name = ciso_ms_soup_kitchen_investment_var
			add = 25
		}
		clamp_variable = {
			name = ciso_ms_soup_kitchen_investment_var
			min = 0
			max = 100000000
		}
	}
}
ciso_ms_soup_kitchen_decrement_effect = {
	scope = state
	effect = {
		change_variable = {
			name = ciso_ms_soup_kitchen_investment_var
			subtract = 25
		}
		clamp_variable = {
			name = ciso_ms_soup_kitchen_investment_var
			min = 0
			max = 100000000
		}
	}
}
